Package com.fluidops.iwb.util

utility classes for SSL support, process handling, strings, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configurable
    A configurable is something that can be configured.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    IWB config, leverages fbase Config via containment
    DateTimeUtil
    Utility methods to deal with date time
    Format
    handles format conversions
    Graph
    simple graph which serves as a pre cursor to RDF
    Graph.Edge<T>
    graph edge as s,p,o triple
    Graph.Node<T>
    graph node
    HTMLSanitizer
    A convenience class for HTML text that provides sanitizing functionality based on OWASP
    HttpFilter
    copy user context from http session to backend context
    IWBFileUtil
    Various convenience functions to create File objects
    ObjectPersistance<T>
    Handles serialization and deserialization of IWB objects
    OracleSPARQLConnection
    This SPARQLConnection ignores context information because the Joseki SPARQL endpoint used for Oracle doesn't support named graphs in the FROM clause.
    QueryResultUtil
    Utility class to retrieve queries as table model
    QueryResultUtil.ColumnActionComponentBuilder
    This convenience util creates an FComponent that can be used as triggering actions in an ActionableResultWidget with column actions.
    QueryResultUtil.RowActionComponentBuilder
    A special convenience util to create an FComponent that can be used to trigger actions in an ActionableResultWidget with row configuration.
    QueryStringUtil
    Utility functions for dealing and creating SPARQL queries.
    RepositoryFactory
    Repository Factory to load supported and custom Repositories via RepositoryFactory.getRepository(String).
    RepositoryFactory.RepositoryFactoryBase
    Abstract base class for any RepositoryFactory.
    SNMP
    supports SNMP as a source of services yielding tree structured results
    SNMP.Value
    SNMP key value pair
    SQL
    Convenience class for SQL interaction
    SQL.H2SQL
    Specific implementation of SQL for MySQL connections
    TableResultComparator  
    UIUtil
    A convenience class for UI render methods
    UrlUtils  
    User
    user object for managing login data for providers.
    VoIDCalculationUsingRepositoryResult  
    VoIDCalculationUsingSPARQLAggregation
    Class implementing VoIDManagement using SPARQL Aggregation for calculating VoID statistics.
    VoIDManagement
    Abstract class encapsulating the mechanisms for calculating VoID statistics.
    WidgetPersistence
    Handles serialization and deserialization of Widgets objects
    WidgetPersistence.OperatorConverter
    Convert Operator using the given serialization
    WidgetPersistence.ValueConverter
    Converts the object of URIImpl into a simple URI string for more readability
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Format.Delimiter  
    SQL.SQLType  
    TableResultComparator.ValueType
